VulnGuardian

Cybersecurity bot that performs comprehensive vulnerability analysis on web applications, APIs, JavaScript, and LLMs following OWASP guidelines.

Back to Projects

Project Overview

VulnGuardian is a cybersecurity bot that performs comprehensive vulnerability analysis on web applications, APIs, JavaScript, and LLMs. Following OWASP guidelines, it identifies security flaws, offers actionable recommendations, and ensures robust protection against exploits.

This ChatGPT GPT is available at: https://chatgpt.com/g/g-U4Plx6cJp-vulnguardian

API Security

"Can you review this Postman collection for API vulnerabilities?" → Triggers a full OWASP API Top 10 analysis.

Authentication Analysis

"Is this login flow vulnerable to OWASP Top 10 issues?" → Targets authentication, session management, and CSRF.

JavaScript Security

"Can you find security issues in this JavaScript code?" → Reviews for XSS, insecure DOM access, and unvalidated inputs.

HTTP Request Analysis

"Here's an HTTP request — can you find vulnerabilities?" → Analyzes raw request structure for injection points.

Technical Capabilities

  • Code Interpreter & Data Analysis: Analyzes code and data for security vulnerabilities
  • DALL·E Images: Creates visual representations of security concepts and vulnerabilities
  • Web Search: Accesses up-to-date information about security best practices and vulnerabilities
  • 90+ Conversations: Trained on extensive security dialogues to provide accurate and relevant responses
